alert.note: Alert for Nicholas; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 9:39PM EST until February 06 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Licking River at Blue Licks Spring affecting Robertson and Nicholas Counties. .Heavy rain from the past few days has caused the river to rise. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Licking River at Blue Licks Spring. * WHEN...Until early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Cropland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM EST Friday the stage was 26.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning.
